title: *gasp*
review: Ok, pieces of it are over the top.  Don't walk into this film expecting a visual effects masterpiece.  What you're going to see is a handmade home video-ish piece.  It's extremely rough, enough to make you motion sick if you're so inclined.I'm sitting here 4 hours after watching it and I can't get it out of my head.  Why did it happen? How?  What was that thing over there?What's that noise outside?
